name: Severen
overview: Built in an alpha of GBS3, Severen is the story of a fallen king trying to understand why his kingdom was attacked and to attempt to save the Queen. Playing across 10+ full levels with interchangeable limbs that allow for new abilities and secret paths to be found. The full game will feature an overworld full of puzzles and NPC areas to explore as well as the main levels the game will play similarly to Deadeus with multiple endings, just with a more action oriented platformer style.
